name: Woody Blox
description: A classic and challenging puzzle. Your goal is to move the blocks so that the main green block you can move to the arrows. Move the green block to the far right and close the arrows. Each new level will be harder and harder.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or High Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Directx 9.0 compatible Sound Card
